Comments: Too many solids! Add some pattern!
A striped shirt and striped tie may clash. The stripes should be different widths- 2 complete stripes should fit inside the other one.
Large stripes need to be paired with small stripes!
Make sure the pattern is at least twice as small as stripes.
This is a tricky pattern mix- make sure the patterns are different sizes.
